category.name: Manufacturing
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: MRMToolCheckType
preference.preference_description: Defines the tool attribute categories that are checked during Manufacturing Resource Manager save operations. Valid Values: "NX CAM TOOL PARAMETERS": Checks the set of tool assembly attribute values that are sent to NX CAM based on its NX CAM tool type. "NX CAM TOOL RETRIEVE": Performs a dry run of the NX tool retrieve to ensure that the correct attribute values are used.
